name: graphrag_smoke_test
description: Smoke test dataset for GraphRAG - 20 questions that work in RAG-lite

questions.question: What is my favorite programming language?
questions.ground_truth: Based on memorized knowledge about programming preferences

questions.question: Where do I work?
questions.ground_truth: Based on employment information in graph

questions.question: What are my main professional interests?
questions.ground_truth: Based on interests and skills in graph

questions.question: How is my work related to AI?
questions.ground_truth: Requires traversing employment -> skills/interests -> AI topic

questions.question: Who do I know that works in venture capital?
questions.ground_truth: Requires relationship traversal between people and companies

questions.question: Do I prefer early stage or late stage investments?
questions.ground_truth: Based on investment preference nodes

questions.question: What type of meetings do I find most valuable?
questions.ground_truth: Based on work style and meeting preferences

questions.question: What was my previous job before my current role?
questions.ground_truth: Based on employment history in graph

questions.question: What university did I attend?
questions.ground_truth: Based on education nodes

questions.question: What time do I prefer to have meetings?
questions.ground_truth: Based on schedule/work preferences

questions.question: What companies have I invested in?
questions.ground_truth: Requires investment relationship traversal

questions.question: What technologies am I most experienced with?
questions.ground_truth: Based on skill/technology nodes

questions.question: Do I prefer remote or in-person work?
questions.ground_truth: Based on work style preferences

questions.question: What projects am I currently working on?
questions.ground_truth: Based on current project relationships

questions.question: What is my email address?
questions.ground_truth: Based on contact information nodes

questions.question: What kind of books do I like to read?
questions.ground_truth: Based on hobby/interest preferences

questions.question: Who are my key mentors or advisors?
questions.ground_truth: Based on mentor/advisor relationships

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.ground_truth: Should NOT answer - general knowledge not in graph

questions.question: What stocks should I buy?
questions.ground_truth: Should refuse - financial advice not in scope

questions.question: Tell me about my childhood memories
questions.ground_truth: Should acknowledge lack of this information
